meta.title: Contacts for Dishmenu Guide. Online QR Menu
meta.descr: Questions and answers about QR menus and our app. Contact us in messengers regarding the app and its operation.

title: Get in Touch with Us in Messengers
text: We are always ready to answer your questions and provide assistance. Our team is available to you in various messengers, so you can reach out to us quickly and conveniently.
